meanings.definition: Last in a series or process
meanings.sent1: The finalis piece of the puzzle completed the picture.
meanings.sent2: The finalis chapter of the book revealed the mystery.
meanings.sent3: The finalis cookie in the jar was secretly saved for later.
meanings.sent4: The finalis scene in the movie left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The finalis exam determined the students' grades.

meanings.sent1: The finalis decision was made after much discussion.
meanings.sent2: The finalis answer to the question ended the debate.
meanings.sent3: The finalis coin flip determined who would go first.
meanings.sent4: The finalis verdict in the trial brought closure to the case.
meanings.sent5: The finalis vote sealed the fate of the proposal.

meanings.sent1: His finalis was to become a successful musician.
meanings.sent2: The finalis of the project was to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: Her finalis was to travel the world and experience different cultures.
meanings.sent4: The finalis of the competition was to win the championship trophy.
meanings.sent5: Achieving his finalis brought him great satisfaction.
